name: Dominator (Loadstar)
overview: Knees' first domino program will have you clicking in your fevered sleep, it was created for a single player and published in Loadstar #175. Your goal is to remove dominoes from the window in pairs, trying to end up with the lowest score possible. Your score is the number of pips on the remaining dominoes. There are 55 dominoes in a 8x8 dominoes set with a domino (half a domino) ranging from a blank to a 9. Any two adjacent dominoes that share a common domino may be clicked on and removed from play. Adjacent means above, below, left, right or diagonally to the other. Once you remove some dominoes, you can click on deal to gather and deal more dominoes from the 46 remaining. Info gotten directly from LoadStar #175 table of contents and from the Read About it section of that disk.
